Sept. 2, 1878 D Belle Vue Brass Band Contest
British Open 1 Test Piece Contest
british-open
Test Piece Contest
Romeo et Juliette [Gounod arr. Godfrey]
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Additional source: Manchester Times (Manchester, England), Saturday, September 7, 1878; Issue 1082.
33 bands played.
Prizes: 1st: £30 2nd: £20 3rd: £15 4th: £12 5th: £7
